reactTrigger.expression:
(GetOwner() == GetInstigator())
&&
GetSkillPurchased(GetInstigator(),GetCurrentWeaponSkilltree(GetInstigator()),$#981011333:6064632317521042744$)
&&
HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "ComboStep.End")
&&
!HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "ComboStep.End2")
&&
!HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "ComboStep.ProcHit")
&&
GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent())) != GetReactionTypeId() 
&&
(GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent())) != GetEffectTypeId())
&&
GetOwner() == GetInstigator()
